MAN.TITLE: xs2fig
MAN.SHORT_DESCRIPTION: send graphics to a file in Xfig syntax

PARAM_ITEM.PARAM_DESCRIPTION: : optional integer. 0 means black and white and 1 means color. The default value is to use a value compatible with the screen status.

DESCRIPTION.P: xs2fig sends the recorded graphics of the window win_num in the file filen in Xfig syntax. This function works only if the selected driver is "Rec" or if the window is in "new style".
